ComicInfo.Summary:
The Colonizer Empire was created to fight a threat from beyond the stars, but now that the Colonizers have fallen, ther ancient enemy has resurfaced. And where does Raader and her crew find themselves? The last place they would expect to be: on the bridge of Colonizer ship!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Butch Guice | 1 | B | Cover B | Andrea Mutti | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Andrea Mutti | 4 |
